TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed ContainerType extends System.Enum

remarks.format: ## Remarks Item containers holds item containers that implement the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IDataBoundItemControl> interface, such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> controls. List containers hold list containers that implement the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IDataBoundListControl> interface, such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>, or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater> controls.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.DynamicData.ContainerType Item = int32(1)

Docs.summary: Indicates an item container that implements the interface, such as a control or a control.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.DynamicData.ContainerType List = int32(0)

Docs.summary: Indicates a list container that implements the interface, such as a control, a control, or a control.
